extendedInfo.description: Enjoy this relaxing ambient HD video of a relaxing green stream in the woods.  Looks great on your phone, tablet, or Google TV. Turn this on as a background in your office, while entertaining, preparing a meal, reading, or even trying to fall asleep. This HD video will make you feel as if you were there....Features (Free Version)-  HD quality video for your phone, tablet or large screen TV using Google TV-  HD quality sound - with both natural and multiple soundtracks to choose from.  White noise from clip is very soothing and relaxing and can be used to fall a sleep-  HD video acts as a great back drop, similar to a live wallpaper or screen saver when the app is running-  Go beyond your typical aquarium, fish tank or fireplace wallpaper or screen saver with Moodscapes-  No streaming or lagging once app is installedFeatures (Full Version)-  No Ads-  Video alarm to wake up to soothing waves and sound-  Timer to turn video off after certain time period-  Text that can be customized or branded for your office or home in place of Moodscapes text.  Moodscapes logo can be removed as well.-  HD Video may not be compatible with some older phones Please check out our other nature Moodscapes and enjoy!

reviews.title: NOT so SERENE STREAM
reviews.comment: The stream is too fast. I don\'t really find it relaxing. Somewhat static other than the water. Otherwise, I suppose it is indeed green. The download is very large, but I suppose that is to get around bandwidth streaming issues. Would I pay 99c for this video? Don\'t think so as I could easily play content from YouTube on my GTV.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Relaxing and great HD picture.
reviews.comment: White noise and nature screen saver is relaxing.  Use this as a backdrop while preparing dinner and reading.
reviews.author: A Google User
